preqs: One of ASP2011, PHS2011, PHS2022, PHS2061, PHS2062 or PHS2081.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ASP2011, PHS2011, PHS2022}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ASP2011, PHS2011, PHS2022, PHS2061, PHS2062, PHS2081}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ASP2011, PHS2011, PHS2022}

description: This unit gives students theoretical background and practical experience in modern observational astronomy. ASP3231 students study telescope optics, spectroscopy, CCD imaging, image processing, statistics, astronomical distances, stellar evolution, extra-solar planets, neutron stars and galaxies. An observational project, including an astronomical observing session and analysis of the observations, comprises a substantial component of ASP3231.
